\documentclass{webquiz}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\title{Production decisions}
\begin{document}


\begin{question} % a quiz question
For the system of linear equations
\begin{gather*} 
x-y=7\\
y=-x+5
\end{gather*}
which of the following deductions is correct?
\begin{choice}[columns=1] % multiple choice question
\incorrect
\begin{gather*} 
-y=x+7\\
y=-x+5
\end{gather*}
\correct
\begin{gather*} 
-y=-x+7\\
y=-x+5
\end{gather*}
\incorrect
\begin{gather*} 
y=x+7\\
y=-x+5
\end{gather*}
\incorrect
\begin{gather*} 
y=-x-7\\
y=-x+5
\end{gather*}
\end{choice}
\end{question}


\end{document}
